src.runtime.org.grails.plugins.webtest
Class GroovyStep

java.lang.Object
  com.canoo.webtest.steps.Step
      src.runtime.org.grails.plugins.webtest.GroovyStep

class GroovyStep
extends Step

Wrapper class for groovy scripting.

author:
Dierk Koenig
author:
Marc Guillemot
@webtest.step category="Extension" name="groovy" description="Executes the provided Groovy script (the binding is the same for all groovy steps within a webtest)."

Indicates if properties should be replaced in the script (default false) @webtest.parameter required="no" default="false" description="Indicates if properties (${...} and #{...}) present in the script should be replaced by their value. Use carefully as ${...} is although the syntax for GString."
